title: Mystery Thank you Skin?
body: Riot can you tell me what skin i got, i have a lot of skins and champions and i cant for the life of me find the skin i got for the thank you gift?

replies.body: You'll get a notification for the mystery gift if you already owned Riot Kayle. These gifts are still being sent out in waves, so if you haven't received it by the *23rd*, please let me know.
I got the message but then a few days later is when i got the actual skin, it just took patience, thank you anyways. :D
I haven't got anything from riot at all even though i already have riot kayle.

i don't think they sent them yet...
i checked every champion and every skin i have and still nothing same on gifting history
it told me i got a surprise from riot and i had the summoner icon xD
Just go to your gift history in shop.
It doesnt show any gift from riot
you can use elophant to see all of your skins.
